front.title: PCEP Extensions for Computing-Aware Traffic Steering (CATS) Service

abstract.t: The CATS (Computing-Aware Traffic Steering) can steer traffic between clients of a service and sites offering the service. The C-PS may be deployed as a PCE and the ingress CATS-Router could be viewed as a PCC. This document proposes the PCEP extensions for selecting and distributing the paths for CATS services.
